main event: Strange lights were observed in the sky over Rapid City in March 1957.
interesting points: The lights changed colors, cycling from white to blue to red., The lights had a reflection pattern slanting outward., The objects appeared to be moving slowly and had a halo of light around them., The observation lasted for about 20 minutes., The lights seemed to be rotating and were possibly linked to an astronomical display.
sighted object: changing colored lights in the sky
witness description: Capt. Thomas J. O'Hara from the 29th Air Division
